## smoothNoise3D() function

Calculate smooth 3d noise by a 3d position

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function smoothNoise3D(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, p: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | current shader scope |
|  p | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | 3d position at where to calculate noise |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

noise value between 0 and 1
